overview_of_class: 108-1, 108-2, 108-3. Elementary Polish I, II, III. This course series teaches students to speak, read, and write in Polish, as well as familiarizes them with Polish culture. It employs the most up-to-date techniques of language teaching (e.g. communicative and accelerated learning, and learning based on students' native language skills), as well as multileveled target-language exposure.
name: Elementary Polish
subject: SLAVIC
